storage.value:
Getting Started Guide

Welcome to TinyForgeAI! This guide will help you get up and running quickly.

Installation

To install TinyForgeAI, run the following command:

pip install tinyforgeai

Quick Start

After installation, you can train your first model with:

foremforge train --data your_data.jsonl --out ./model

API Reference

Complete API documentation for TinyForgeAI.

Training API

The training API provides methods for:

  • Loading datasets
  • Configuring training parameters
  • Running training jobs
  • Monitoring progress

Inference API

The inference API allows you to:

  • Load trained models
  • Run predictions
  • Batch processing

Frequently Asked Questions

What is TinyForgeAI?

TinyForgeAI is a framework for training small, focused language models from your own data.

What hardware do I need?

For dry-run mode, any modern computer works. For real training, a GPU with at least 8GB VRAM is recommended.

How do I prepare my data?

Your training data should be in JSONL format with 'input' and 'output' fields.
